links.*: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
'''The Society''' was a dining club associated with the [[University of Oxford]]. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] became a member in [[Wikipedia:Hilary term|Hilary Term]] [[1935]] and attended most dinners until moving from [[Oxford]].<ref>{{CG|RG}}, p. 962</ref>

The papers (including manuscripts by Tolkien) of the Society are held at the [[Bodleian Library]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.bodley.ox.ac.uk/dept/scwmss/wmss/online/modern/society/society.html|articlename=Catalogue of papers of The Society, University of Oxford|dated=|website=[http://www.bodleian.ox.ac.uk/bodley Bodleian Library]|accessed=16 January 2012}}</ref>
